title: No such official announcement has been made so far. We found multiple media reports speculating if Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma would take retirement from the T20 format, but none of them has mentioned that Rohit has announced his retirement.
vclaim: No such official announcement has been made so far. We found multiple media reports speculating if Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma would take retirement from the T20 format, but none of them has mentioned that Rohit has announced his retirement.
